name: Lowa Camino Gore-Tex Backpacking Boots - Men's
description: Stable trekking and backpacking boots for rough trails. The padded tongue and flexible ankle allow your foot to move naturally, and zone lacing customizes the tension over your foot. A stable insole and grippy sole, keep you upright and supported when carrying a heavy pack.Nubuck leather upper with Gore-Tex waterproof-breathable membrane.FlexFit ankle zone for easier movement.C4 tongue and X-lacing® keeps padded tongue where you want it, preventing blisters.2 independent lacing zones and roller eyelets let you fine-tune the fit.Stiff nylon insole.DuraPU® polyurethane midsole with supination and pronation support.Vibram® Apptrail outsole with multi-directional lugs.
